topic.title: Using the VBS script
topic.shortdesc: How to install the FusionInventory agent using the VBS script.

body.p: The project provides a VBS script for automatic agent rollout:
To use it, you need to adjust some variables:

ol.li:
versionverification: agent version you plan on installing. If the agent is either missing or outdated on the computer, a new one will be installed.
Ex: versionverification = "2.1.9-3"

fusionarguments: command line arguments to perform the unattended installation (see ).
Ex: fusionarguments= "/S /server=http://server1/glpi/plugins/fusioninventory/"

fusionsetupfile: path to the FusionInventory agent setup file.
Ex: fusionsetupfile = "\\server1\share$\fusioninventory-agent_2.1.9-3.exe"

uninstallocsagent: whether the script should uninstall any existing OCS Agent installation.
Ex:uninstallocsagent = "yes"
